item.title: Starting to Blog
item.description: This is my first post with Hugo and Github Pages. I’m not sure if the fault is mine or if the fault is with the tutorials, but I found multiple different ways to accomplish the goal of starting a static Blog not using Wordpress, Ghost, Blogger, etc. Github Pages coupled with Hugo seemed to be the thing I was looking for. Never mind that I would need to learn Markdown Language.
